commit.message:
FIX: memReporter

Verified with command: jcmd <lingering program> VM.native_memory

FIX: compilationMemoryStatistic.cpp

Verified with command: java -XX:CompileCommand=memstat,\*.\*,print App.java

FIX: metaspaceStatistics.cpp

Verified with command: jcmd <lingering program> VM.metaspace show-loaders show-classes by-chunktype

FIX: printCLDMetaspaceInfoClosure.cpp

Verified with command: jcmd <lingering program> VM.metaspace show-loaders show-classes

FIX: memoryFileTracker.cpp

The streamIndentor had no effect since neither StreamAutoIndentor nor
indent() was used.

Verified with command: java -XX:+UseZGC -XX:NativeMemoryTracking=detail -XX:+PrintNMTStatistics --version

Before:

Memory map of ZGC heap backing file

[0x0000000000000000 - 0x0000000024000000] allocated 603979776 for Java Heap from
[0x00000001079e16d0]ZPhysicalMemoryManager::commit(ZVirtualMemory const&, unsigned int)+0x1b4
[0x00000001079d4398]ZPartition::prime(ZWorkers*, unsigned long)+0x27c
[0x00000001079d574c]ZPageAllocator::prime_cache(ZWorkers*, unsigned long)+0xf4
[0x0000000107997910]ZHeap::ZHeap()+0x18c

After:

Memory map of ZGC heap backing file

[0x0000000000000000 - 0x0000000024000000] allocated 603979776 for Java Heap from
    [0x00000001063c56d0]ZPhysicalMemoryManager::commit(ZVirtualMemory const&, unsigned int)+0x1b4
    [0x00000001063b8398]ZPartition::prime(ZWorkers*, unsigned long)+0x27c
    [0x00000001063b974c]ZPageAllocator::prime_cache(ZWorkers*, unsigned long)+0xf4
    [0x000000010637b910]ZHeap::ZHeap()+0x18c

FIX: Remove indent from outputStream::print_data()

ErrorContext::bytecode_details is the only caller that uses indentation
in print_data(). The jvmci callers print on tty or a stringStream,
without indentation.

FIX: classfile/verifier.cpp

Verified by manually inserting an invalid opcode into a classfile.

Replaced an opcode with the 'cf' opcode, which is invalid. The opcodes
'cb'-'fd' are unassigned and reserved for future use.

Caused by: java.lang.VerifyError: Bad instruction: cf
Exception Details:
  Location:
    MediumHarvestChurn.main([Ljava/lang/String;)V @56: fast_fgetfield
  Reason:
    Error exists in the bytecode
  Bytecode:
    0000000: 2a03 32b8 0007 b600 0d3c bb00 1159 b700
    0000010: 134e 1b9a 0006 a700 6a2d 1064 b200 1468
    0000020: bc08 b600 1a57 a7ff ec3a 0403 3605 1505
    0000030: 1020 a200 2803 3606 cf06 b200 20a2 0017
    0000040: 2d15 05b2 0020 6815 0660 b600 2357 8406
    0000050: 01a7 ffe7 8405 01a7 ffd7 b800 2706 b200
    0000060: 2c68 bc08 4dbb 0011 59b7 0013 4e01 4db8
    0000070: 0027 8401 ffb2 002f 1233 b600 35a7 ff95
    0000080: b1
  Exception Handler Table:
    bci [25, 38] => handler: 41
  Stackmap Table:
    append_frame(@18,Integer,Top,Object[#17])
    same_frame(@25)
    same_locals_1_stack_item_frame(@41,Object[#30])
    append_frame(@46,Object[#30],Integer)
    append_frame(@56,Integer)
    chop_frame(@84,1)
    chop_frame(@90,1)
    chop_frame(@128,1)

FIX: StackMapTable

Verified with command: java -Xlog:verification=debug:log.txt App.java

FIX: defaultMethods

Verified with command: java -Xlog:defaultmethods=debug:log.txt App.java

FIX: memMapPrinter

Verified with command: jcmd <lingering program> System.map
